messages.subject: cute bedtime moment
messages.msgSnippet: I just had to share this cute bedtime moment with everyone. I was just putting 3yo. dd to bed and when I took off her pants to put her pull-up on I noticed she
messages.messageBody:
I just had to share this cute bedtime moment with everyone. I was just
putting 3yo. dd to bed and when I took off her pants to put her pull-up on I
noticed she had on 2 pair of pants. When I asked her why she said it was
because she wanted to look cute and cool at the same time. Well 7yo. dd and
I burst out laughing and then she added to the humor by telling 3yo. that
cute and cool together made cuticool (as opposed to cuticle). Sorry, I'm
just having one of those, I'm gushing because my kids are so cute moments.
Amy
